name: 陳彥霖
objective:
現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。
本課程涵蓋下列主題：
1　　通訊軟體特性
2　　程序式程式設計
3　　物件式程式設計
4　　物件導向式程式設計
5　　泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)
6　　單元測試
7　　通訊軟體函式庫
8　　通訊軟體設計個案研
9　　通訊軟體設計專題
schedule:
Part I: The basics
1. Types, variables, strings, console I/O, computations, errors, vectors functions, source files, classes. (3 weeks)
Part II: Input and Output Programming
2. File I/O, I/O streams (1 week)
3. Graphical output (1 week)
4. Graphical User Interface (GUI) Programming) (2 weeks)
Part III: Data structures and algorithms
5. Free store, pointers, and arrays (1 week)
6. Lists, maps, sorting and searching, vectors, templates (2 weeks)
7. The STL (2 weeks)
Part IV: Broadening the view
8. Software testing and maintenance (2 weeks)
9. Text processing, Communication software design, embedded systems programming, software testing, C, etc. (2 weeks)
10. Specific Topics on Project Practices. (2 weeks)
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments: 50%, 6-8 Assignments
Mid-term Project: 20% 
Final Project: 30%
materials:
Textbook:
“Programming: Principles and Practice Using C++”, Bjarne Stroustrup, Addison Wesley, 天瓏書局, 2009.

2.“The C++ Standard Library : A Tutorial and Reference”(C++ 標準程式庫), Nicolai M. Josuttis(侯捷 譯), Addison Wesley(碁峰出版社), 1999.
3.“C++ GUI Programming with Qt4, 2/e”, Prentice Hall, 2008.
Open source Software Libraries (Source Forge, Open Foundry, Google Code…)
